com.mobixell.xtt
Class HTTPCache

java.lang.Object
  com.mobixell.xtt.HTTPCache

public class HTTPCache
extends Object

HTTPCache

Stores files in memory and makes sure the newer of either memory or disk is returned

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2009

Company: 724 Solutions Inc

Version:
$Id: HTTPCache.java,v 1.3 2009/02/13 13:35:11 rsoder Exp $
Author:
Roger Soder

public HTTPCache(String defaultFile)

Method Detail

getFile

public byte[] getFile(String output,
                      File root,
                      String fname)
               throws IOException
Returns a bytearray with the content of the file or null if no file found.

Parameters:
output - output to print inf front of EMPTY,CACHE and DISK, null if no output
root - the root directory of the disk where files come from
fname - the filename relative to the root directory, written in unix style with /
Throws:
IOException

getFile

public byte[] getFile(String output,
                      File root,
                      String fname,
                      String directory)
               throws IOException
Returns a bytearray with the content of the file or null if no file found.

Parameters:
output - output to print inf front of EMPTY,CACHE and DISK, null if no output
root - the root directory of the disk where files come from
fname - the filename relative to the root directory, written in unix style with /
directory - additional directory between the rootDirectory and the actual files
Throws:
IOException

getFileSize

public int getFileSize(File root,
                       String fname)
Returns the size of a file or -1 if no file found

Parameters:
root - the root directory of the disk where files come from
fname - the filename relative to the root directory, written in unix style with /

getLastModified

public long getLastModified(File root,
                            String fname)
Returns the last modifed date in miliseconds since 1st January 1970 or -1 if no file found.

Parameters:
root - the root directory of the disk where files come from
fname - the filename relative to the root directory, written in unix style with /

getLastModified

                            String fname,
                            String directory)
Returns the last modifed date in miliseconds since 1st January 1970 or -1 if no file found.

Parameters:
root - the root directory of the disk where files come from
fname - the filename relative to the root directory, written in unix style with /
directory - additional directory between the rootDirectory and the actual files

Store a file in the cache, last modifed date is the time of storage.

put

public void put(String fname,
                byte[] data,
                String directory)
Store a file in the cache, last modifed date is the time of storage.

Parameters:
fname - the filename relative to the root directory, written in unix style with /
data - the byte[] of data
directory - additional directory between the rootDirectory and the actual files
